subject: Pre-Order Questions
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to purchase *SIMSONN Sim Racing Gear Shifter Magnetic
Induction* and *2x SIMSONN VAM pro linear motors* through AliExpress, but
before I place the order, I have a few important questions.

First, the total price of the items I need is above 150€, which means I
will have to pay an additional import tax. Because of this, I would like to
ask if it would be possible for you to declare a lower value (below 150€)
on the package, so that I don’t have to pay the extra tax. If this is
possible, I will definitely make the purchase on AliExpress.

Also, could you please tell me what kind of mounting brackets are included
with these motors? Are they intended to be mounted vertically or
horizontally?
I need the motors to be installed horizontally - that is their correct
working position - so I want to know if the package includes the necessary
brackets to mount them horizontally. If they come only with vertical
mounts, would it be possible to change them to the horizontal mounting
brackets? This would save me from needing to buy extra 3D-printed adapters
or mounts.

If this is possible, I will certainly purchase the products.

Thank you very much, and I look forward to your reply!
—
Kind regards,
Tomas

conversations.body_text: Hi Tomas Tautkus,    The horizontal mounting bracket version of Haptics is available for purchase on the official website.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
